entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
